mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.g_no as gNo, b.o_no as oNo, b.depth, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName from board b, user u where b.user_no=u.no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc limit #{startIndex}, #{boardNum}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, contents, reg_date, g_no, o_no, depth, user_no) values(#{title}, #{contents}, now(), #{gNo}, #{oNo}, #{depth}, #{userNo})
